citations.desc: Primary enclosures used to transport live birds.
citations.narrative:
During a routine inspection conducted November 13 – 15, 2024, two birds were observed outside their primary transport
enclosure. The primary enclosure appeared to be homemade and consisted of a wooden frame with thin plastic mesh
attached to the sides. The two parakeets transported in the enclosure escaped and were observed flying around the
room. The birds were retrieved at the time of inspection without injury and placed in a secure enclosure. Construction of
the primary enclosures must be strong enough to contain the birds securely and comfortably and to withstand the normal
rigors of transport. Birds that escape their enclosure could be injured or killed. All primary transport enclosures must be
constructed to securely contain the birds. Corrected at time of inspection November 14, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
HARVEY KENT, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Lindsay Livingston, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.162(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures used to transport live birds. 
During a routine inspection conducted November 13 – 15, 2024, two birds were observed outside their primary transport 
enclosure. The primary enclosure appeared to be homemade and consisted of a wooden frame with thin plastic mesh 
attached to the sides. The two parakeets transported in the enclosure escaped and were observed flying around the 
room. The birds were retrieved at the time of inspection without injury and placed in a secure enclosure. Construction of 
the primary enclosures must be strong enough to contain the birds securely and comfortably and to withstand the normal 
rigors of transport. Birds that escape their enclosure could be injured or killed. All primary transport enclosures must be 
constructed to securely contain the birds. Corrected at time of inspection November 14, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
HARVEY KENT, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER 
Lindsay Livingston, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIGEON INCLUDING ALL DOMESTIC BREEDS
